item.title: Startup Tech Choices
item.dc:creator: josephscott
item.description: I was looking at the BoomStartup 2015 Spring Cohort list, which got me wondering what stack each service was using ( at least for their web site ). Here is what I found. Total sites: 7 Sites that default to HTTPS: 3 / 7 ( 42% ) Web Servers – Nginx ( includes FlyWheel ): […]
item.content:encoded:
I was looking at the BoomStartup 2015 Spring Cohort list, which got me wondering what stack each service was using ( at least for their web site ). Here is what I found.

Total sites: 7

Sites that default to HTTPS: 3 / 7 ( 42% )

Web Servers
– Nginx ( includes FlyWheel ): 5
– Apache: 1

Hosts
– DigitalOcean ( includes FlyWheel ): 2
– AWS: 1
– Wix: 1
– Bluehost: 1
– Rackspace: 1
– Linode: 1

Frameworks
– WordPress: 2
– Drupal: 1

While there are several hosting providers being used, Nginx is the web server of choice.
